name: Hook N' Fight
description:
Play as the protector spirit of an island, and defend it from the malicious invader spirit using your trusty grappling hook! Make your way through the landscape to reach arenas where you'll have to face wave after wave of minions, summoned by the evil spirit!

This game was developped by a team of 3 Game Designers and 2 Programmers as a school project, in 2 months. If you'd like to know more, feel free to visit my portfolio (FR) !

https://victordurel1.wixsite.com/durelvictorportfolio
